patterns: which are the outcomes of IPS training?
can you tell me about IPS Master?
can you give me any idea about Intelligent Processing Systems Master?
responses: Master Intelligent Processing Systems is a specialty master. Holders of the degree will be able to: design and develop computer systems, exploit existing possibilities to design programs dealing with a particular class of problems, measure the degree of relevance of each of the solutions provided and make decisions with knowledge of all the constraints involved.

Master Intelligent Processing Systems is a specialty master. The laureate of this master will be the expert in the design and development of complex information, knowledge and decision systems. it will be able to manage masses of data, filter, extract and organize relevant information while ensuring their security and finally take decisions while measuring their socio-economic and ecological repercussions. The laureates will therefore be entrepreneurs, designers, developers, decision-makers, consultants, and researchers.
